xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 24 March 2014
xwikidoc.content: <tweety098> has quit 09:49 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 09:54 <tweety098> has quit 10:18 <akats> has joined #phenotips 10:27 <SayAsh> has quit 11:14 <vijay13> has quit 11:37 <SayAsh_> has joined #phenotips 14:30 <shalinshah1993> has quit 14:54 <akats> sdumitriu: I took a look at what you are asking me to do. I'm not clear on everything though. 15:14 <akats> Would you like me to turn sections in the word document (for example Corpus Callosum, which has 4 conditions listed under it), into subsections in the PhenoTips list? The subsections in PhenoTips require and HPO term as the id, and they are not provided, but I shouldn't have too much trouble finding the right terms through Solr. 15:14 <sdumitriu> Not yet 15:14 <sdumitriu> The issue is that items in a subsectition are not expandable 15:14 <sdumitriu> That's a bug that needs fixing 15:15 <akats> Oh, I see 15:16 <sdumitriu> But ideally yes, those should be subsections 15:16 <sdumitriu> And the ID is not required 15:16 <sdumitriu> It's not used at all actually 15:17 <sdumitriu> (for subsection titles) 15:24 <vijay13> has quit 15:29 <SayAsh_> has quit 15:46 <vijay13> has quit 16:25 <akats> I think I might have found a bug in PhenoTips, but can't say for sure because it's in the form preview, rather than on the full patient record 16:27 <shalinshah1993> has quit 16:57 <akats> so the bug that we were looking at is "partial" bug. Also I think I found another bug. 17:09 <mcupak> has quit 17:33 <akats> how do you want the file. Just the json, xar zip, or maven formatted xml? 17:35 <akats> I tried checking the terms, but its a bit hard when they are not named the same as on the list 17:43 <sdumitriu> You should put the mapping on dev.phenotips.org 17:44 <akats> I don't have admin access 17:45 <sdumitriu> Yes you do 17:47 <shalinshah1993> has quit 17:53 <akats> http://dev.phenotips.org/bin/PhenoTips/Neuro+Skeletal. I can't guarantee that I didn't miss something, but I did try double checking. 17:53 <sdumitriu> OK, thank you 18:39 <akats> has quit 20:29 <sdumitriu> is now known as <sdumitriu_[Away]>
